body:
# Keep Your Server Under Wraps

RoyalCommands is a general server commands for the CraftBukkit Minecraft server. It has over 135 [commands](http://royaldev.org/commands.php) to change the way you play. Often said to be better than the likes of Essentials, CommandBook, and AdminCmd, RoyalCommand is capable of making managing your server easier than ever.

## Compatibility

With updates, (such as Minecraft 1.3) RoyalCommands should continue to function and adapt to new items in Minecraft.

RoyalCommands fully supports [VanishNoPacket](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/vanish/), a wonderful choice for admin invisibility. Invisible players are not seen in /list, and commands will tell the sender that the vanished player is not online.

RoyalCommands also supports [TagAPI](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/tag/) for changing the name above your head with nicknames.

## Features

RoyalCommands has a plethora of useful features and commands, capable of impressing even the harshest server admins.

 * Automated AFK system complete with kicking ability
 * Download, search BukkitDev for, load, disable, enable, reload, check for updates, and update plugin from in-game.
 * Completely developed ban, tempban, and kick system with support for IPs (and the ability to look up who banned and why)
 * Teleportation suite with /back and requests
 * Fully developed home and warp systems
 * Inventory management - including /give, /item, and selective clear inventory and full clear inventory (also modify other players' inventories)
 * A warning system to complement ban and kick
 * Open enchanting tables, furnaces, and workbenches via command
 * Get masses of information on players (including IPs) - even if they're offline
 * Freeze, mute, jail, and other punishments for rowdy players
 * Check the amount of server lag
 * Set up kits of items
 * Advanced whisper system
 * Integration with VanishNoPacket - use commands on other players if you can see them!
 * TagAPI integration - nicknames change your nametag!
 * Monitor players as if you were them! See what they see in real time
 * Open and use a backpack to save valuable items.
 * Much, much more. You can see all the commands [here](https://royaldev.org/commands.php).

## [Commands](https://royaldev.org/commands.php)

There's over 135 of them!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: RoyalCommands
tagline: A set of essential commands for your Minecraft server
